PLAYER.CONNECTED_TOO_SOON: Our servers aren't ready yet, try connect later

ACCOUNT.REGISTER_ERROR: We had a problem registering your account, try again later
ACCOUNT.LOGIN_ERROR: There's a problem with your login, try contact an administrator

CHARACTER.CREATION_SUCCESS: A new character was created [socialID = {{ socialID }}]

PERMISSIONS.LABEL: PERMISSION SYSTEM

SYSTEM.LABEL: SYSTEM
